text: San Feliciano is a village in the municipality of Magione in the Province of Perugia, Umbria in Italy. From San Feliciano a ferry leaves for the Isola Polvese. The village lies 4 km south west of Magione and 18 km west of Perugia at the Lake Trasimeno. San Feliciano has around 580 inhabitants,ISTAT (Istituto Nazionale di Statistica File:MagioneSanFelicianoPanorama.JPG|Panorama of San Feliciano == External links == * Website van de Pro Loco in San Felicia ==References== Category:Frazioni of the Province of Perugia
title: San Feliciano
